data.title: Stephanie Gibson - Trivia, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Stephanie Gibson: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Actress of the stage and screen who starred as Pixley in the SyFy Network action comedy series Happy! opposite Christopher Meloni and Patton Oswalt. She has also guest starred on episodes of television series including Person of Interest, The Anonymous Lives of John and Jane, The Andy Warhol Diaries, and Run the World. She has performed in Broadway productions of musicals like Spamalot and Addams Family.

Before Fame

She earned her college degree from the Cincinnati College-Conservatory of Music. She made her on-screen acting debut in a 2012 episode of the television series Up All Night.

Trivia

She performed an original one-woman comedy show in New York City that was called Glitter, Goblets, and Gatos. She later reprised her role in the show's sequel, Glitter, Goblets, and Gatos, Too-Electric Boogaloo.

Family Life

She is the ex-wife of actor Will Chase. They married in the year 2009 and divorced in the year 2012.

Associated With
